name: NetServiceBrowser
desc: A network service browser that finds published services on a network using multicast DNS.

items.name: var delegate: NetServiceBrowserDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object for this instance.

items.name: var includesPeerToPeer: Bool
items.desc: Whether to browse over peer-to-peer Bluetooth and Wi-Fi, if available. false, by default.

items.name: func searchForBrowsableDomains()
items.desc: Initiates a search for domains visible to the host. This method returns immediately.

items.name: func searchForRegistrationDomains()
items.desc: Initiates a search for domains in which the host may register services.

items.name: func searchForServices(ofType: String, inDomain: String)
items.desc: Starts a search for services of a particular type within a specific domain.

items.name: func stop()
items.desc: Halts a currently running search or resolution.

items.name: func schedule(in: RunLoop, forMode: RunLoop.Mode)
items.desc: Adds the receiver to the specified run loop.

items.name: func remove(from: RunLoop, forMode: RunLoop.Mode)
items.desc: Removes the receiver from the specified run loop.
